attributes.action: enable Philip Larrassey to return to Warwickshire College, after he was unfortunately turned down to return for an extra two years - this is a terrible mistake, as Philip was the life and soul of the college day, bringing smiles to your face however you felt, we need him back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Philip Larrassey was very unlucky not to return to college.
He made everyone laugh.
Funny comments, funny faces, everything!
Whenever you felt down, you needed Phil!
BRING HIM BACK!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
